title: (Hopefully) easy question about Keen 6
content:
I'm not sure if this has been posted before, I'm assuming it has, but I couldn't find it when I searched. Basically, I was wondering how to get to Blooglab Space Station (I think that's what it's called). I think it might relate to the recreational district, but maybe not.

I'd like to know without cheats btw.

title: Re: (Hopefully) easy question about Keen 6
content:
See that giant Blue mouth-like building in that space platform? Instead of pressing a key when entering it, just keep walking straight forward. You'll get to a fence. Wait and ye see. The orbiting satellite will pick you up.------------------------------
[url=http://shadowm2006.sitesled.com/]My website[/url]
[url=http://p072.ezboard.com/fpubliccommanderkeenforumfrm20.showMessage?topicID=12.topic]Get Windows/Linux native LModKeen 2 with integrated FIN2BMP![/url]. You know you want to.
